name: New Almondport
blurb: One of the few port cities in the Frontier; recently commandeered by the Communion of the Lantern King
people: Baldr Mikalya Monmouth: Young for a Baldr, Mikalya is a half-elf prodigy. She abides strictly to what the Communion stands for, and has even memorized every oath, ritual, cermony, formailty, and tradition of the Lantern King.
misc: Huh, these massive walls seem new. And lots of security, lots of it
